Title: The Last Song
Overview: A drama centered on a rebellious girl who is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.
Tagline: A story about family, first love, second chances and the moment in life that lead you back home.
Keywords: brother sister relationship, new love, daughter, summer vacation, woman director
Cast: Miley Cyrus, Greg Kinnear, Bobby Coleman
